title: Missing persons cases 2012 to 2019
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Number of cases. In total the number of data points it has is 8.
In general Number of cases has rose over the Year.
Number of cases is slightly increasing from 2012 to 2017, and lastly roughly constant from 2017 to H1_2019.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2015 and 2016.
Maximum Number of cases, about 236656.0 was reported at Year H1_2019
The lowest Number of cases, of value 120791.0 was reported at Year 2012
